title: A new champion
body:
Hey everyone,

I'm looking for a new champ with great mechanics to learn, is fun and isn't useless.

I've been looking at a few for a while now and here is what I have gathered:

Riven
Ahri
Gnar
Vayne

Any opinions to help make up my mind are appreciated!

Thanks,

replies.body: Maybe try Syndra? Using her balls (heh) can be a lil difficult at times, but she wrecks face is played right.
I've played Syndra during the free weeks, she isn't overwhelmingly interesting, great stuns though!
I'm a fan of Jayce. He's got a pretty extensive kit and a very flexible play style.

If you want a champion who isn't picked/banned a lot, try Gnar. He's a newer champ, so his mechanics and visual effects are naturally higher. Learning to play him and master him puts you way ahead of a lot of people, considering that not many no how to play against him (yet). You may just be a trend setter!
Thank you for your voice of opinion!
